Text: Hello from CanadaHi Jon Thought I would send that email to Beth but my computer says the address you gave me is not a valid address Maybe you could email me the correct one Anyway seeing as I am interrupting your work day I might as well carry on I sure do worry about you two living and working in what is sure to be a hot spot for who knows what You dont think you could talk Beth into moving to Canada I know we are not safe either but Houston is so far away and maybe we are just a little safer I watched Oprah yesterday and she had people in the know on about the safety of the airlines Those people said it is not safe to fly so how are we to return to normal It is going to take months to train air marshalls Are you sure you are going to Florida for Thanksgiving What are the thoughts for Christmas Think about Calgary you could have dinner with the family visit your friends and maybe go skiing The bad thing is you have to fly here Anyway you can let me know I talk to Grandpa almost every day He is having a hard time He is very lonely I talked to the nurse at the hospital where my Mum is She had a bad spell and was threatening to commit suicide A psychiatrist evaluated her and prescribed some medication because she is so anxious He said he thought she had vascular dementia and not alzheimers because she was able to answer questions They were not all the right answers but he said a person with alzheimers isnt able to figure out that it was a question and therefore respond She did have radiation treatment long ago on the back of her head for cancer I always wondered if damage was done at that time Im telling you this so you dont feel so threatened by the disease in the family Your Dad was laughing and said Wouldnt it be scary if my Mum ended up being the most with it of the folks I know life just gets more depressing I will send some pictures from Dads birthday to you soon I think we need to get a scanner and then it would be quicker although I guess you go through a lot more cartridges when you print out pictures Steve has gone to BC for his competition this weekend He doesnt have any aspirations of winning but says at least he did it He got down to lbs so made light weight Im hoping he goes back to real food but stays in shape How is the squash game going Has Beth beat you yet Are you still golfing We are pretty well done with the golf but curling started Thursday Both Dad and Robert were away so Joanne and I and two spares managed to get a win Joanne skipped and I played second By the way Joanne thinks she is moving to Toronto with work She said probably Nov st I guess Mirant bought the last of Trans Canada Pipeline and so she and some marketing guy will set up the Toronto office I read in the paper that this makes Mirant only second to the US giant Enron Meanwhile Mirant was moving into Eau Clair this weekend as they need more space Im sorry I rambled on If you get me the right address for Beth Ill bug her next time Love to both of you and please keep safe Love Mum
